mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.customer_name, c. NAME AS contacts_name, d.num AS contract_num FROM `wk_crm_return_visit` AS a LEFT JOIN `wk_crm_customer` AS b ON a.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN `wk_crm_contacts` AS c ON a.contacts_id = c.contacts_id LEFT JOIN `wk_crm_contract` AS d ON a.contract_id = d.contract_id where visit_id =#{id}
